## Description

`hdm` is package to build temporal species distribution models. `hdm` uses an temporal environmental information to model the niche as an n-dimensional Minimum Volume Ellipsoid. 

## Installation

```{r}
if (!require('devtools')) install.packages('devtools')
devtools::install_github('luismurao/hdm')
```
